title: Minneapolis Health Clinic, PLLC
author: Minneapolis Health Clinic; PLLC
cleaned_text: We are currently offering all COVID-19 vaccines that have been either FDA approved or been granted Emergency use Authorization (EUA) by the FDA. Please speak to your primary care provider or visit [HERE](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/stay-up-to-date.html#vaccine-table) to choose the right vaccine for you. This service is available to everyone ages 6 months and up. Please click the button below to schedule your appointment. This website uses cookies. By continuing to use this site, you accept our use of cookies.
